title: OpenAI brings age prediction to ChatGPT to limit sensitive content for under-18 users: here's how it works
snippet: OpenAI is rolling out age prediction for ChatGPT to make sure that its system accurately determines the age of users and then limts the kind of interaction that chatbot can have with them.&nbsp;

title: Tech Execs at Davos Highlight AI’s Power as a Geopolitical Tool
snippet: Anthropic’s Chief Executive Officer Dario Amodei compared artificial intelligence chips to nuclear weapons. Google DeepMind’s CEO said China’s technology is just months behind the US. Signal’s Meredith Whittaker called new adaptations of AI uniquely “perilous.”

title: Apple iPhone 15 for  ₹31,990 on Croma Republic Day Sale? Here's how to grab the deal
snippet: Croma’s Republic Day Sale brings a massive deal on the iPhone 15, dropping its effective price to  ₹31,990 with exchange benefits, bank cashback and bonus offers. The sale is live across stores nationwide until January 26. Here's how the deal works.

title: Redmi Note 15 Pro series specifications for India leak ahead of imminent launch: What to expect
snippet: Xiaomi’s Redmi Note 15 Pro and Note 15 Pro+ are tipped to launch in India soon. A new leak reveals expected RAM and storage options, display details, cameras, chipsets, battery capacities and charging speeds ahead of the official announcement.

title: OpenAI concludes AI Jam sessions to drive AI adoption in social sector
snippet: OpenAI concludes AI Jam sessions to drive AI adoption in social sector

title: Oppo A6 5G launched in India with 7,000mAh battery: Price, features and more
snippet: Oppo has unveiled the A6 5G in India, a mid-range smartphone boasting a massive 7,000mAh battery, 5G connectivity, and impressive features. Priced from Rs. 17,999, it offers a stellar camera setup and durability, catering to users seeking performance and longevity in their devices.

title: AI Agents ‘Perilous’ for Secure Apps Such as Signal, Whittaker Says
snippet: Artificial intelligence agents that autonomously carry out tasks pose a threat to secure apps such as Signal, according to Meredith Whittaker, president of the Signal Foundation.

title: Elon Musk labels X recommendation algorithm ‘dumb’ after open-sourcing it
snippet: X has open-sourced its recommendation algorithm, publishing the feed ranking code on GitHub. Elon Musk says the move boosts transparency, letting users and developers see how posts and adverts are ranked and improved in real time.

title: Korea Kicks Off AI Squid Game in Bid to Compete With US, China
snippet: The state-backed survival contest aims to find the best indigenous AI models.

title: Vivo X200T India launch confirmed for January 27: Here's what to expect
snippet: Vivo has confirmed the India launch of the Vivo X200T on January 27. The premium smartphone will likely feature the MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset, Android 16-based OriginOS 6, a 120Hz AMOLED display, triple 50-megapixel cameras, and fast charging support.

AI benefits must be distributed evenly to avoid it becoming a bubble: Nadella
snippet: Speaking at a session at Davos during the World Economic Forum Annual Meeting, Nadella said it will be a "tell-tale" sign of a bubble if all the AI talk focused only on the supply side or the technology companies.

snippet: As budget constraints loosen, Wipro is bidding for several small AI deals alongside large- and ‌mega-deals, Pallia said on the sidelines of the World Economic Forum's annual meeting in Davos, Switzerland, without providing details. title: Brazil gives Musk's xAI 30 days to tackle fake sexualised content from Grok
snippet: The Brazilian ‌consumer protection agency Senacon, data protection authority ANPD and the Office of Federal Prosecutors said they can take further administrative or judicial measures if X does not ​comply.

title: OpenAI rolls out age prediction on ChatGPT
snippet: OpenAI's ‌CEO of applications, Fidji Simo, had in December said that she expects "adult mode" to debut within ChatGPT in the first quarter of 2026, following chief executive Sam Altman's comments about allowing mature content for users ‍who verify their age.

title: FTC says it will appeal Meta antitrust decision
snippet: The FTC said it continues to allege that, for more than a decade, Meta Platforms Inc. has "illegally maintained a monopoly" in social networking through anticompetitive conduct "by buying the significant competitive threats it identified in Instagram and WhatsApp."

title: Emergent bags major funding; Sebi greenlights PhonePe IPO
snippet: Happy Wednesday! AI startup Emergent has raised fresh funding, tripling its valuation to around $300 million. This and more in today’s ETtech Morning Dispatch.

title: Voice AI startup Bolna raises $6.3 million from General Catalyst, others
snippet: Voice AI startup Bolna has raised $6.3 million in a funding round led by Silicon Valley-based venture capital firm General Catalyst. The round also saw participation from Y Combinator, Blume Ventures, Orange Collective, Pioneer Fund, Transpose Capital, and Eight Capital, along with angel investors.

title: Persistent Systems Q3 profit jumps 17.8% YoY, beats estimates despite labour code hit
snippet: Mid-tier IT services company Persistent Systems has reported a 17.8% year-on-year increase in December-quarter net profit, despite taking a one-time charge due to labour code changes, surpassing analyst estimates

title: Regulatory clarity key for crypto adoption: Binance co-CEO Richard Teng
snippet: Binance co-CEO Richard Teng says clearer crypto regulations are needed for wider adoption in India, even as the US leads the sector.
